extensionDescription.message: Browse your Pinboard bookmarks and add new ones with ease.

optionsFooter.message: Copyright © 2018 Pawel Grzybek. Issues & feature requests: Twitter, GitHub.

optionsLoginManual.message: An authentication token is a short opaque identifier in the form "username:TOKEN" that allows PinBuddy to make API calls without ever asking for your password. You can find your API token on a settings page under the password tab.

optionsLoginError.message: Error. Please make sure that you use a correct token and that your internet connection is stable.

optionsOfflineMessageOne.message: Look at the official Pinboard tour.

optionsOfflineMessageQuote.message: Pinboard is a personal archive for things you find online and don't want to forget.

optionsOfflineMessageTwo.message: Exactly — "online". Please make sure you have a stable internet connection.

optionsWelcomeMessage.message: Hi. You are logged in as $name$.

optionsToReadChecboxByDefault.message: "To read" checkbox by default (add url view)

popupErrorMessage.message: Error occurred. Please make sure that your token is valid, and that your internet connection and the Pinboard API status is stable.

popupLoggedOutViewMessage.message: An authentication token is a short opaque identifier in the form "username:TOKEN" that allows PinBuddy to make API calls without ever asking for your password. You can find your API token on a settings page under the password tab.

popupLoggedOutViewButtonMessage.message: Go to option page to log in

popupOfflineMessageOne.message: Look at the official Pinboard tour.

popupOfflineMessageQuote.message: Pinboard is a personal archive for things you find online and don't want to forget.

popupOfflineMessageTwo.message: Exactly — "online". Make sure you have a stable internet connection please.

popupInvalidProtocolParagraph.message: Allowed protocols are http, https, javascript, mailto, ftp and file. Unfortunately you cannot save this URL.

popupInvalidProtocolButton.message: Find out more in Pinboard API documentation
